title: Script Initials - WCRD
author: glenwood

comments.content:
'WCRB': should be one (Brisk) of the many illegal copies of [Brody](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317073232/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/brody)/ [Brophy Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317073232/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/brophy-script)  
'BASEBALL': [Sporting Life](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317073232/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/sporting-life) looks fine but can't state if it's the one
